title: Game freezes
body: I get decent FPS, and my ping is fine, but every game it freezes anywhere from 5 to 10 seconds. Usually near the start of the game, but not always. Abilities are usually being used as well.   IDK what to include, or if this is the right place to post this, but I gotta get a fix.

replies.body:
When you say your game freezes, do you mean that just the characters freeze and you're still able to move around the camera, or the entire client freezes? I'll need a few more details to understand what's going on. However, if this is where everything freezes, this may be caused by the Windows Game Bar, which has caused FPS issues and freezes in the past. I recommend going through [**this guide**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to ensure this feature is disabled.

Let me know if this helped.
